analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā no āsavaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsavam na akusalam dhammam paccayā āsavaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanoāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na noāsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Dukamūlakaṁ ekaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: duka mūlakam eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
